feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of punctuation usage with consistent use of commas and question marks.

overall_explanation: Considering the consistent punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, similar sentence structures, shared text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is moderate to high.
